pizzaProgram.database
Class DatabaseCredentials

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.database.DatabaseCredentials

public class DatabaseCredentials
extends Object

Class for reading the URL, password and username of the database from a locally stored configuration file.

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

Field Summary
private  String password
          A String holding the database user's password.
private static String PASSWORD_TYPE
          The String found in the config file denoting that the value following the semicolon is the database user's password.
private  String url
          A String representing the database URL.
private static String URL_TYPE
          The String from the config file denoting that the value coming after the colon is the database's URL
private  String username
          A String holding the database's username
private static String USERNAME_TYPE
          The String in the config file denoting that the value following the colon is the database's username

Constructor Detail

DatabaseCredentials

public DatabaseCredentials()
Method Detail

loadFromFile

public void loadFromFile(String src)
The method reads the entire contents of the file, and looks for the URL, username and password among its contents. Lines in a properly formatted configuration file starts with either #, if the line is a comment, or the key-value pairs of the configuration value, eg "PASSWORD: mypassword". Once found the method, using the helper methods of the class, store these values in the private fields of the method.

Parameters:
src - The filepath to the configurationfile (can be either a relative path or an absolute path)

getURL

String getURL()
Returns the URL of the database the way it was read from the config file

Returns:
The URL to the database

getUsername

String getUsername()
Returns the username of the database user as it was read from the database credentials config file

Returns:
The database user's username

getPassword

String getPassword()
Returns the database user's password as it was read from the database credentials config file

Returns:
The dataabase user's password

readLine

private void readLine(String line)
Method that evaluates wether the provided line from the configuration file is empty or a comment. If it is not, it splits the line into it's key-value pairs as a string array, and sends them to the setValueStringByType method for further processing.

Parameters:
line - The line to be processed.

setValueStringByType

private void setValueStringByType(String type,
                                  String contents)
Method that evaluates which type of field to be updated with the provided contents. It then sets the relevant field to its correct value.

Parameters:
type - The type of the field that is to be modified.
contents - The data that is to be added to the field.

lineIsComment

private boolean lineIsComment(String line)
Method that evaluates wether or not the given line is a comment.

Parameters:
line - The line that is to be evaluated.
Returns:
True if the line is a comment, false in all other cases.
